name: Dawnbreaker - Aeon's Reach
description:
Dawnbreaker - Aeon's Reach is an erotic visual novel that puts you in the heels of a jaded bounty hunter looking for fun, causing her to embark on a hot cosmic adventure with a bunch of outlaws.

Many different routes and girls await you in this lewd game, your choices changing the entire outcome of the story.

Will you be able to find what you desire in this universe?

Overview


Dawnbreaker - Aeon's Reach is an erotic visual novel with many routes and choices supported by a cast of well-built characters.

It contains appealing, high-quality 3D graphics as well as animations to make this an unforgettable lewd experience.


  • Take part in an ambitious quest

Hop in on a lewd adventure with some of the hottest girls of the galaxy. What you do with them is up to you, so choose wisely.



  • Danger is around every corner

Space is not a bed of roses. Anything could happen that could put an end to your adventure. Be careful about what you do and say.



  • A vibrant universe awaits

There are many locations for you to explore. Arid deserts, lush jungles, forgotten ships… All of them with their characteristics.



  • Erotic events of all sorts

This visual novel comes with a wide catalog of erotic postures for you to enjoy. Let them ignite your senses and your desire as well.



Features

  • A lewd story around 50k+ words long (from 5 to 6 hours of gameplay)
  • Multiple paths with several different endings
  • A whole cast of sensual girls for you to meet
  • 4k high-quality graphics
  • 300+ unique CGs with animations
  • Detailed 3D backgrounds with multiple variations
  • Image gallery, music room, and replay scene functionality
  • Achievements, Easter eggs, and more!
